attributes.action: Reinstate Joe Hart as the Manchester City goalkeeper
attributes.background: I have watched Manchester City for over 65 years and passionate supporters like me firmly believe that Joe Hart is still one of the finest goalkeepers in the world. We demand Joe Hart's immediate reinstatement as first choice goalkeeper.

rejection.details: Neither the UK Government nor the UK Parliament have any role in team selection at Manchester City Football Club.  Team selection is a matter for MCFC alone.
